Posts.Content: Mar 25, 2010 02:46PM Whodathot wrote: Thanks Luv9483 for the encouragement.  How soon after her lumpectomy did she start the six weeks of radiation?
Posts.Title: Newly Diagnosed & Overwhelmed VRamos Denise2287

Posts.Content: Mar 24, 2010 06:03PM Whodathot wrote: I'm 51 and had my first appointment on 03/17 as well with the surgeon.  I'm Stage 1 breast cancer.  I'm having a lumpectomy next Tuesday followed by several weeks of radiation.  This is all new to me too - talk about a shock.  There is no breast cancer in my family so needless to say, its been a shock for everyone.  I know nothing about this type of surgery and nothing about radiation so needless to say, I'm not looking forward to it but very thankful that I've found this website and lots of women to talk to while I'm going through it.  Let's keep each other company through these unchartered waters.
Posts.Title: Newly Diagnosed & Overwhelmed VRamos Denise2287
